mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_RESIGNATION='N'
SELECT EMP.DEP_CD,DEP.DEP_NAME,COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM EMPLOYEE EMP INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT DEP ON(EMP.DEP_CD = DEP.DEP_CD) WHERE EMP.EMP_RESIGNATION ='N' GROUP BY EMP.DEP_CD, DEP.DEP_NAME

SELECT EMP_CD , DEP_CD , PO_CD , SIGN_IMG , OUT_ATCH_CD , OA.ATCH_NO , OUT_ATCH_DT , OUT_ATCH_AT , OUT_STAR_COURS , OUT_ATCH_NM , OUT_ORIGIN_NM , OUT_ATCH_CN , OUT_ATCH_SIZE , OUT_ATCH_EXIST , OUT_FILE_NO FROM EMPLOYEE EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN OUT_ATCH OA ON(EMP.ATCH_NO = OA.ATCH_NO) WHERE SUBSTR(EMP_CD,1,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM')
SELECT TO_CHAR(ENP_START,'YY/MM') ENP_START ,COUNT(*) count FROM EMPLOYEE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ENP_START,'YY/MM') ORDER BY ENP_START DESC

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT SAL_NO , SUM(SAL_TOTAL) SUMSALARY FROM SALARY_DETAIL GROUP BY SAL_NO ORDER BY SAL_NO DESC)B )A
where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5
ORDER BY RNUM DESC
